summary: Just a small mod that replaces the main theme in the main menu with a synthesizer version of the theme.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Wanna help support my modding efforts? Look at the main page of my website [url=http://darkwolfmodding.wix.com/darkwolfmodding] here [/url] and read the text on the home page about it.[/size]

Just a small mod that replaces the main theme in the main menu with a synthesizer|Bass version of the theme.
Made in FLStudio11

Preview it Here:
[url=https://soundcloud.com/darkwolfmodding/skyrim-theme-synth-version]Preview Here[/url]

Installation:
Copy the music folder into your skyrim Data Directory

Uninstallation:
Remove "mus_maintheme.xwm" From "Music-Special"
author: DarkWolfModding
